definition: the quality of being cheerful and dispelling gloom, to show approval or good wishes by shouting
details:
noun
- the quality of being cheerful and dispelling gloom
= example: the quality of being cheerful and dispelling gloom
= synonyms: cheerfulness
- a cry or shout of approval
verb
- to show approval or good wishes by shouting
= example: to show approval or good wishes by shouting
- to spur on or encourage especially by cheers and shouts
= example: to spur on or encourage especially by cheers and shouts
= synonyms: barrack
- to become cheerful
= synonyms: cheer up, chirk up
- to cause somebody to feel happier or more cheerful
= example: to cause somebody to feel happier or more cheerful
= synonyms: cheer up, jolly along, jolly up
- to give encouragement to
= synonyms: recreate, hearten, embolden
